title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: cotton on piña cloth (pineapple fiber)
Technique: embroidered
description: Rectangular piece of fabric for the sleeve of a blouse embroidered in a design of a plant in a basket alternating with leaf and scroll motif. One scalloped edge.
